Title: The Great Muppet Caper
Genre: Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Family, Musical, Mystery
Writer: Tom Patchett, Jay Tarses, Jerry Juhl, Jack Rose
Actors: Jim Henson, Frank Oz, Dave Goelz, Jerry Nelson
Plot: Kermit and Fozzie are newspaper reporters sent to London to interview Lady Holiday, a wealthy fashion designer whose priceless diamond necklace is stolen. Kermit meets and falls in love with her secretary, Miss Piggy. The jewel thieves strike again, and this time frame Miss Piggy. It's up to Kermit and Muppets to bring the real culprits to justice.
